content:
There are many great Korean BBQ restaurants around the world, but here are a few recommendations based on popularity and reviews:

1. Kang Ho Dong Baekjeong (locations in Los Angeles, New York, and Atlanta)
2. Gyu-Kaku (locations in the US, Canada, and Japan)
3. Palsaik Korean BBQ (locations in Los Angeles and New York)
4. Mapo Korean BBQ (locations in Vancouver and Toronto)
5. BiWon Korean BBQ & Sushi Restaurant (Toronto)

These are just a few recommendations, and there are many other great Korean BBQ places around the world that you can try. Be sure to check online reviews and ask locals for recommendations to ensure you have a delicious and authentic experience.
